import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { Redirect } from "react-router-dom"; import Footer from "../JSXaux/Footer" //import axios from 'axios'; import io from 'socket.io-client' export default class Ingame extends Component { constructor(props){ super(props); const token = localStorage.getItem('token'); const partyId = this.props.match.params.id; this.SocketManager = this.SocketManager.bind(this) const socket = io('http://localhost:7001/') this.state = { token, partyId, socket } } componentDidMount(){ const init = { partyId: this.state.partyId, token: this.state.token } this.state.socket.emit('newPlayer', init) } SocketManager(){ const socket = io('http://localhost:7001/') socket.on('user-connected', name => console.log(name)) } render() { if (!this.state.token){ return () } return (

    Players
    ) } } /*
